title: Sparse Signal Regression with L1-Based Models
description: In this lab, we will demonstrate how to use L1-based regression models to deal with high-dimensional and sparse signals. In particular, we will compare three popular L1-based models: Lasso, Automatic Relevance Determination (ARD), and ElasticNet. We will use a synthetic dataset to illustrate the performance of these models in terms of fitting time, R2 score, and sparsity of estimated coefficients.

meta.title: L1-Based Regression Models | Sparse Signals | Machine Learning
meta.description: Learn how to use L1-based regression models like Lasso, ARD, and ElasticNet to deal with high-dimensional and sparse signals. Explore a synthetic dataset and compare model performance.
meta.keywords: L1-based regression, Lasso, ARD, ElasticNet, sparse signals, high-dimensional, machine learning

i18n.title: 使用基于L1的模型进行稀疏信号回归
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将演示如何使用基于L1的回归模型来处理高维和稀疏信号。具体来说，我们将比较三种流行的基于L1的模型：套索（Lasso）、自动相关性确定（ARD）和弹性网络（ElasticNet）。我们将使用一个合成数据集来说明这些模型在拟合时间、R2分数和估计系数的稀疏性方面的性能。

meta.title: 基于L1的回归模型 | 稀疏信号 | 机器学习
meta.description: 了解如何使用套索（Lasso）、自动相关性确定（ARD）和弹性网络（ElasticNet）等基于L1的回归模型来处理高维和稀疏信号。探索一个合成数据集并比较模型性能。
meta.keywords: 基于L1的回归, 套索（Lasso）, 自动相关性确定（ARD）, 弹性网络（ElasticNet）, 稀疏信号, 高维, 机器学习
